import React, { useState } from "react"; import Bussiness_Sidebar from "../Bussiness_Sidebar"; import Navbar from "../Navbar"; const AddNewUser = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(); const [userfirst, setUserFirst] = useState(); const [Userlast, setUserLast] = useState(); const [UserEmail, setUserEmail] = useState(); const [username, setUsername] = useState(); const [Userpassword, setUserPassword] = useState(); const [UsercPassword, setUserCPassword] = useState(); const [UserRole, setUserRole] = useState(); const [UserSalesCommision, setUserSalesCommission] = useState(); const [UserMaxsalesDiscount, setUserMaxSalesDiscount] = useState(); const [UserBirth, setUserBirth] = useState(); const [USerGender, setUserGender] = useState(); const [UserBloodGroup, setUserBloodGroup] = useState(); const [UserNumber, setUserNumber] = useState(); const [UserFamilyNumber, setUserFamilyNumber] = useState(); const [UserAccountHolder, setUserAccountHolder] = useState(); const [UserAccountNumber, setUserAccountNumber] = useState(); const [UserBankName, setUserBankName] = useState(); const [UserBankIdentifi, setUserBankIdentifi] = useState(); const [UserBranch, setUserBranch] = useState(); const [UserTaxPay, setUserTaxPay] = useState(); const [error, setError] = useState(false); const userGender =(e)=>{ setUserGender(e.target.value) } const AddNewUserHandler = async (e) => { // e.prevesntdefault('') if (!title || !userfirst || !Userlast || !userGender || !UserBirth || !userGender || !UserBloodGroup || !UserNumber || !UserFamilyNumber || !UserAccountHolder || !UserAccountNumber || !UserBankName || !UserBankIdentifi || !UserBranch || !UserTaxPay // || !city || !address || !mobile || !adhar // || !patientType || !consultant || !department || !specility || !fees || !feesdiscount || !totals || !receiptmode ) { setError(true); return false } const userId = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'))._id; let result = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/opd-registation", { method: "post", body: JSON.stringify({ titlemr, firstname, lastname, gender, dob, age, month , days, religion, bloodgroup, fathertitle, fatherName, verticals, refby, sponser , country, countryState, city, address, mobile, adhar , patientType, consultant, department, specility, fees, feesdiscount, totals, receiptmode, userId }), headers: { "Content-type": "application/json" } }); result = await result.json(); navigate("/opd_details") console.log("reult", result); console.log(dob, age, month, days); } return ( <>
